name: Nothing but Run
description:
Welcome test subject.

Task:

  • Activate each of the 10 terminals.
  • You can interact with them when the red alarm is on.
  • The lights will become green when fully activated.

Controls:

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Move

SPACE  / ENTER / H - Activate Ability

Abilities:

  • Dash: Gives you speed boost for short time
  • Repulse: Pushes all nearby robots away from you
  • Shield: HOLD to protect yourself. The shield will go away after a short time or when you release the action button.

Caution:

The laser-bot production is malfunctioning. They will also be present in the test chamber.

Their lasers are several times hotter than the sun.

Advisory:

There are several access paths where the bots' sensors do not work. They cannot enter these areas.

Use these to your advantage.

Advisory:

Press Space to activate your experimental evasive ability.

Completing a terminal will replace your current ability with a new one.
